reviews.text: Great hotel and I would stay here again! Not near center but I appreciated this. It was right near the main train station which was MUCH appreciated after a long journey! I wasn’t in the mood to navigate further, so this was a delight to simply walk there. So thoughtful to have tons of signage pointing you to the hotel! I even loved the area because there were great restaurants and shops near by with true locals. This gave me a great insight to life in Vienna! Loved the modern rooms and modern lobby. Check in girls very nice no matter the time. Great bartenders in the lobby. BEST thing was incredible breakfast and the little Biergarten! (Walk over to Bernardo’s for a delicious and cute dinner)

I would really want to show appreciate for the person at the reception who showed empathy to understand my situation. It was 1:15 in the night , my train was delayed by four hours and despite being knocked over by other hotels as being booked out ( while they have rooms available on booking websites) , they really helped me out. Fabulous personal touch, the rooms are great and really recommend it to everyone.

I think this hotel is quite good. Its location is very close to the central station, and there’s a supermarket right next to it, making it convenient for shopping. It’s also very close to the subway station. The room is very clean, and I found the bed and pillows to be quite comfortable. The price is also very reasonable.

I had an excellent stay with my parents. The room is clean. It's well designed and thus very convenient to use.
The location is excellent, near to public transportations (metro, bus, train and regional bus), restaurants and shopping mall. Overall, the quality is very good for the price I paid.

The hotel is located a few minutes away from the central station and offers easy access to most attractions. I found my experience at the hotel to be a bit disappointing. I don't even know if the hotel has a housekeeping department since my room was filthy everywhere. The receptionists didn't seem to be professional and kind. They were sitting down and talking to each other all the time.  There's a lot to be improved.
